name: Drag Racer: Pro Tuner
description:
Get ready to race with Drag Racer: Pro Tuner, the original drag racing game on the App store! With more than 50 million races, Drag Racer is the ultimate game for customizing and racing your dragster.

**********

“Level of Customization is unrivaled in App Store" -AppVee.com”

"Drag Racer: Pro Tuner offers some tough but enjoyable drag racing tied in with a neat RPG style upgrade system." -- 148Apps.com (4 stars and placed second in the Best App Ever Awards for Racing Games)

**********

Choose:

Drag Racer: Pro Tuner features so many amazing cars and trucks to select from!

Personalize:
Customize your drag racer with engine, gears and wheels.


Upgrade:
Tune your gear ratios, tire compounds, and boost suspension to maximize your performance and achieve superior results!

Race:
Put your drag racer to the test and race to victory!

Optimized features and enhanced customization increases the performance of Drag Racer: Pro Tuner, the largest drag racing franchise in the world.

**********

Check out our other amazing games!! Sheep vs Aliens, Fidget Spinner Toys and Drag Racer World.

**********
